programme.title: Modern weddings
programme.short_synopsis: Modern weddings - and why it's best not to write your own service.
programme.medium_synopsis: Comparing two modern weddings to discover why it's best not to write your own order of service.
programme.long_synopsis:
Comparing two modern weddings to discover why it's best not to write your own order of service.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
